attributes.action: UK government to look at the current "justice" system and prison terms
attributes.additional_details:
To make our communities a safer place. 
To bring real justice for victims. 
To prevent re-offending and more victims.
To acknowledge the work and dedication the police put in to make our streets safe.
To protect children and vulnerable people.
To ensure laws are fit for purpose
To reduce criminal activity that is carried out by non UK 
citizens. Deport criminals that aren't UK citizens regardless of their crimes.
attributes.background: Crimes against children- rape- assault. The sentence for the victim? A life time. The sentence for the perpetrator not even 4 years? Where is the justice? British justice system is a joke. Give victims justice. Re write the sentences that can be handed down. Stop early release. Build more prisons!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You may also wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action:  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/706886
